name: ext_R5_ImmunizationEvaluation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImmunizationEvaluation for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ImmunizationEvaluation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationEvaluation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Describes a comparison of an immunization event against published recommendations to determine if the administration is "valid" in relation to those  recommendations.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
